# # VirtualAccountParameters


```php
use Xendit\PaymentMethod\VirtualAccountParameters;
```

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Examples |

| **min_amount** | **float** |  |  | null |
| **max_amount** | **float** |  |  | null |
